DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 9 % Canadians Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) lifetime . In military veteran population , lifetime prevalence PTSD estimate high 20 % . Numerous research study demonstrate short-term , cognitive-behavioral psychotherapy , Cognitive Processing Therapy ( CPT ) , lead substantial improvement PTSD symptom . However , research suggest minority clinician provide therapy clinical setting . The transfer research knowledge clinical setting remain one large hurdle improve health Canadians PTSD . It well establish attend 2-day workshop therapy alone insufficient promote adequate knowledge transfer sustain skillful use . The current study aim contrast whether two form post-workshop support ( 6-month duration ) , different level expert oversight , result superior level clinician skill patient outcomes versus formal post-workshop support . The three form post-workshop support 1 ) technology-enhanced group tele-consultation 2 ) standard group tele-consultation 3 ) tele consultation . The primary secondary outcome assessment clinician ' competence CPT patient symptom , respectively . This study inform best transfer evidence base therapy outcomes clinical milieu attain comparable outcome observe research . The investigator ' hypothesis follow : Hypothesis 1 : The technology enhance group tele-consultation condition evidence high level fidelity , standard group tele-consultation condition evidence intermediate level fidelity , no-consultation/fidelity monitoring condition evidence low fidelity . Hypothesis 2 : Fidelity CPT protocol , irrespective consultation condition , positively associate improved client outcome . Hypothesis 3 : Organizational context variable , organizational climate readiness change , influence uptake CPT skill , well extent skill utilized practice .
DOC.criteria: Clinician participant ( n=120 ) recruit study either Operation Stress Injury ( OSI ) network clinician , Operational Trauma Stress Support Centre ( OTSSC ) network clinician communitybased clinician treat militaryrelated PTSD . Both male female clinician participant recruit ; Clinician participant great 18 year . Mental health clinician clinics private practitioner eligible participate study : 1. attend CPT workshop ; 2. employee OSI OTSSC clinic , register VAC clinician , private practice treat individual militaryrelated PTSD ; 3. currently provide psychotherapy military soldier veteran PTSD ; 4. consent randomize one three study condition ; , 5. willing solicit patient participation . Eligible patient participant : 1. client clinician participant , diagnosis PTSD , determine clinician independent assessment , total PCL score equal great 45 ; 2. willing consent session audiorecorded listened fidelity rater potentially clinicians teach learn CPT . Patients permit continue psychotherapeutic intervention specifically focus treat PTSD symptom . Patient participant must age 18 . Ineligible patient include eligible CPT base state research evidence , include : 1. current uncontrolled psychotic bipolar disorder ; 2. unremitted substance dependence diagnosis ( substance abuse allow ) ; 3. current imminent suicidality homicidality require imminent attention ; 4. significant cognitive impairment .
